Reclusa::

She glanced at Perceptor then turned to look at Hydras. "Well, if one
is to do it, then one must be good at hiding themselves."  She took a
deep breath and let it out slowly. "Then sir, I volunteer for the job.
I suggested it in the first place. By warrior code, I'll go."

She wanted revenge and what better way than to watch up close and make
sure they are destroyed. 




--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Airly" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Hydras:
> 
> The male hissed and replied "Just two or three years ago, we
sucesfully introduced a spy there... but eventually he was discovered,
and altough he managed to scape and capture a good hostage... He was
discovered... if oher spy have to go there.. then this must be planned
carefully... kidnapping a maximal and disguise the volunteer as it, or
disguise the volunteer as maximal and behaves likes one... for at
time, but if we do that we have to recreate a pod's arrival and we
have the risk that Unicron decides to capture our spy... that're the
ways that I suggest"
